sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; //redux import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const AdminBody = () => { //Redux global state property //from store const { products } = useSelector((state) => state.products); return (
{products && products.map((product) => (
Review

Rs. {product.productPrice}

{product.productName}

{product.productDesc.length > 60 ? product.productDesc.substring(0, 60) + "..." : product.productDesc.substring(0, 60)}

Add to cart

))}
); }; export default AdminBody;
